# Scenarios Docs

> Documentation for Scenarios Docs.

- [F# Machine Learning Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/scenarios/machine-learning.md): Learn about machine learning with F#.
- [F# for Web Development](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/scenarios/web-development.md): Learn about web development options with F#.
